entry.title: WIND WARNING , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and early afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
